title: Shopping Cart: Change database to MongoDB for NGMobile
description:
Description
ShoppingCart uses relational database, but it operates only on big JSON documents.
So the wrong database technology is in use.
Due to wrong database ShoppingCart service has limited performance, which might not be sufficient for load after NGMobile.
In scope of this Epic we change the database to MongoDB and do some first steps about optimization.
We will keep the database change simple, so that we are ready for more performance tuning in case that is really required in the future.
Other benefits of database change:
We get rid of hosting costs for MariaDB as a service, because we have already MongoDB in place for other applications.
Lower operations effort, because afterwards we will have only 1 database technology in place.
MariaDB has several security issues reported in PSA - these will be fixed by this Epic.
